title: Oracle vs Salesforce vs IBM vs SAP? - Quora

response.answer_text: I would say, as Sebastian already stated, the customer will be the ultimate winner, but that race will be won by the one who demonstrate the capability to fit the new customer needs and expectations: flexibility, interoperability, easiness, mobility and, why not, affordability. Check this article mentioning what Forrester found among CIO's opinion an the new trends for enterprise software: http://www.zdnet.com/article/enterprise-software-the-big-trends-and-why-they-matter/Being said that, I think everyone could have his own conclusion on who the winner would be... my personal one: none of them but the one who have the vision and guts to change their current offerings to meet market expectations (or may be an outsider...)
